title: Learning Object-Based Simulation Design for Higher Education Strategy and Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and general comprehension of sociology
context.additional_context: Environment optimized for smartphone-based VR content utilization. Requires lightweight solutions considering limited technological infrastructure

learning_goals: Learning object (LO) components can be analyzed to design the integration of educational content and technology.
VR simulations can be used to creatively implement higher education strategy execution scenarios.
Technology-based educational improvement plans can be proposed in project form through collaborative problem-solving.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
